item.title: Home terraplanter/garden
item.description:
Found this beautiful kickstarter at: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/terraplanter/terra-planter-the-inside-out-hydroponic-planter-pot . Youtube video for the same is at: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GruSnziMV4U

Nice simple alternative to that which can be reasonably found: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3_Jv9b94WOg

A nice vertical green tower: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HWviyAuh-aE

  • I think i can make more improvement on it, like ability to add manure at any level of tower, also clay design would help as pockets can directly absorb from it.
